examples.example: 今天妈妈用鸭血做了一道美味又营养的菜肴。

translate.english: Today mother made a delicious and nutritious dish with duck blood.

examples.example: 我很喜欢去小吃街吃那碗加了鸭血的粉丝汤。

translate.english: I really like to go to the snack street to eat that bowl of vermicelli soup with duck blood.

examples.example: 鸭血粉丝汤是南京的特色美食之一，很多游客都很喜欢。

translate.english: Duck blood and vermicelli soup is one of the characteristic delicacies in Nanjing, and many tourists like it very much.
